mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT p.* FROM sys_menu p WHERE ( EXISTS( SELECT a.id FROM sys_role_menu a JOIN sys_role b ON a.role_id = b.id JOIN sys_user_role c ON c.role_id = b.id JOIN sys_user d ON d.id = c.user_id WHERE p.id = a.menu_id AND d.id = #{userId} ) ) AND p.del_flag = 0) h ORDER BY h.order_no ASC

SELECT b.* FROM sys_role_menu a JOIN sys_menu b ON a.menu_id = b.id WHERE b.menu_type = "button" AND b.del_flag = 0 AND b.`status` = 'A'
AND a.role_id = #{roleId}
